drinks.name: B52
drinks.method:
Layering or building is done by gently pouring the liquid over the back of a bar spoon. Grand Marnier is the preferred triple sec to use for this drink.

1. Pour the coffee liqueur into a shot glass.
2. Layer the Irish cream
3. Layer the Triple Sec

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.method:
1. Pour Gin into a mixing glass filled 2/3rds with ice.
2. Stir thoroughly.
3. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
Garnish with an olive of a twist of lemon peel.

A dirty martini contains a splash of olive juice while a perfect martini contains equal portions of dry and sweet vermouth.
	Asking for a Martini shaken not stired is simply a snobby way of asking for a weak Martini and should be avoided.

drinks.name: Costa del Sol
drinks.method:
1. Half fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Pour all the ingredients except for the soda water into the glass
3. Stir gently
4. Top up with soda water.
5. Garnish with an orange wheel and a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Caipiroska
drinks.method:
1. Put the lime wedges and sugar into an old fashioned glass.
2. Muddle (avoid over-muddling the lime as it might release too much lemon oil from the rind)
3. Pour in vodka (Stir until sugar disolves?)
4. Add crushed ice
5. Stir well

Garnish with a wedge of lime.

This is a variation of the Caipirinha which is the official cocktail of Brazil.
Use turbinado sugar instead of raw sugar if available.

drinks.name: White Lady
drinks.method:
Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Alexander
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

drinks.name: Americano
drinks.method: Mix the ingredients directly in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice-cubes, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

drinks.name: Angel Face
drinks.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bacardi
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Note: You should really use Bacardi white rum.

drinks.name: Between the Sheets
drinks.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Casino
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry.
Note: You should use Old Tom Gin.

drinks.name: Clover Club
drinks.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Derby
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a fresh mint leaves in the drink.

drinks.name: Gin Fizz
drinks.method:
Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with lemon slice.

drinks.name: John Collins
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry.
Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
(Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Mary Pickford
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Monkey Gland
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. 2 drops Absinthe, 2 drops Grenadine

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with half orange slice.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.method:
Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water.
Muddle until dissolve.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.
Garnish with orange slice and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Paradise
drinks.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Planter's Punch
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, 'on top'.
Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

drinks.name: Porto Flip
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.
Strain into cocktail glass.
Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

drinks.name: Ramos Fizz
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute.
Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

drinks.name: Rusty Nail
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with lemon twist.

drinks.name: Sazerac
drinks.method:
Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside.
Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside.
Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the Lemon peel for garnish.
Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

drinks.name: Screwdriver
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.Garnish with a orange slice.

drinks.name: Sidecar
drinks.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.method:
Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white).
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain in cocktail glass.
If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
Garnish with half orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Tuxedo
drinks.method:
Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass. Note: Should use old tom gin.

drinks.name: Bellini
drinks.method:
Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations:
* Puccini (fresh mandarin juice)
* Rossini (fresh strawberry puree)
* Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

drinks.name: Black Russian
drinks.method:
Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned-glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

drinks.name: Champagne Cocktail
drinks.method:
Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute.
Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.
Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.method:
Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Strain into a large cocktail glass
Garnish with lime slice.

drinks.name: Cuba Libre
drinks.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: French Connection
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
Stir gently. IBA Suggest Disaronno amaretto

drinks.name: God Father
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
Stir gently. IBA Suggest Disaronno amaretto

drinks.name: God Mother
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
Stir gently. IBA Suggest Disaronno amaretto

drinks.name: Golden Dream
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Grasshopper
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: French 75
drinks.method:
Pour all the ingredients, except champagne, into a shaker. Shake.
Strain into a champagne flute.
Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Harvey Wallbanger
drinks.method:
Pour vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice.
Stir gently and float Galliano on top. Garnish with orange slices and cherry.

drinks.name: Hemingway Special
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.
Strain into a double cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Horse's Neck
drinks.method:
Pour brandy and gigner ale directly into hi-ball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently.
Garnish with the rind of one lemon spiral
Add dashes of Angostura Bitters to taste (optional).

drinks.name: Irish Coffee
drinks.method: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

drinks.name: Kir
drinks.method:
Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.
For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.method:
Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice.
Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Mai-Tai
drinks.method:
Shake and strain into highball glass.
Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime peel.
Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt

Note: For a Fruit Margarita blend the selected fruit with the above recipe.

drinks.name: Mimosa
drinks.method:
Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently.
Garnish with orange twist (optional).
Note: a Buck’s Fizz and a Mimosa are the same drink.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.method:
Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice.
Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water.
Garnish with spring of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.method:
Combine the vodka and ginger beer.
Add lime juice.
Garnish with a lime slice.

drinks.name: Mint Julep
drinks.method:
In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water.
Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.
Garnish with a mint spring.

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.method:
Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Sea Breeze
drinks.method: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach
drinks.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Singapore Sling
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well.
Strain into highball glass.
Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.method:
Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball with ice cubes.
Add a splash of grenadine to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: Barracuda
drinks.method: METHOD_GOES_HERE

drinks.name: Bramble
drinks.method:
Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass.
Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.
Garnish with a lemon slice, and two blackberries.

drinks.name: Dark 'N' Stormy
drinks.method: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl Dark Rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Martini Dirty
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
Stir well.
Strain in chilled martini glass.
Garnish with green olive.

drinks.name: Espresso Martini
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add Sugar Syrup to taste according to individual preference of sweetness.

drinks.name: French Martini
drinks.method:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well.
Strain in chilled cocktail glass.
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

drinks.name: Kamikaze
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop Martini
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar, garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Russian Spring Punch
drinks.method:
Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.
Garnish with a lemon slice and a blackberry.

drinks.name: Tommy's Margarita
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Vesper
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon. Lillet should be blond.

drinks.name: Yellow Bird
drinks.method: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
